metadata.description: Spells that harm, weaken, destroy, or remove aspects of animals and animal products

spells.name: Curse of the Unruly Tongue
spells.description: This spell prevents a single animal from making any vocalizations. The creature cannot bark, roar, chirp, or make any sound through its mouth or throat. This is particularly useful for silencing guard dogs or preventing animals from warning others.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (destroy an animal product), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter

spells.name: Blunt the Viper's Fang
spells.description: This spell destroys the venom glands or poison delivery system of a single venomous creature. The animal loses its ability to inject poison through bites, stings, or other natural attacks permanently. The creature suffers no other harm.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (destroy part of an animal), +2 Voice

spells.name: Weakness of the Pampered Beast
spells.description: This spell weakens an animal, reducing all its physical capabilities. The target suffers -3 to Strength, Stamina, and Dexterity for the duration. Large predators become manageable, and work animals become nearly useless.

spells.name: Destroy the Fur and Hide
spells.description: This spell completely destroys an animal's fur, hide, or natural covering, leaving the skin bare and vulnerable. The creature loses any natural protection from its coat and becomes extremely sensitive to temperature changes.

spells.name: Cripple the Howling Wolf
spells.description: This spell permanently destroys one of an animal's limbs, causing it to wither and become useless. The limb does not fall off but becomes completely non-functional. This inflicts a Medium Wound on the creature.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy a major part of an animal), +2 Voice

spells.name: Rotting Wound of the Beast
spells.description: This devastating spell creates a severe festering wound on an animal that resists natural healing. The spell inflicts a Heavy Wound that cannot heal naturally and requires magical intervention to close properly. The wound continues to weaken the animal over time.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create a serious lasting injury), +2 Voice

spells.name: Sever the Silk Thread
spells.description: This spell destroys silk threads, spider webs, or similar animal-produced materials within the target area. All such materials instantly disintegrate, freeing anyone caught in webs or destroying silk garments and ropes.
spells.guidelines: Base 1 (destroy simple animal products), +2 Voice, +1 for fine targeting

spells.name: Blind the Keen-Eyed Hawk
spells.description: This cruel spell permanently destroys an animal's sight by damaging its eyes beyond repair. The creature becomes completely blind and suffers all the penalties associated with blindness. The spell causes a Light Wound from the trauma.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (permanently destroy a major sense), +2 Voice

spells.name: Wasting Disease of Livestock
spells.description: This spell causes an animal to waste away over time, losing weight and strength. Each week, the animal loses one point from each physical characteristic (Strength, Stamina, Dexterity) until it dies or the spell ends.

spells.name: Dissolve the Leather Armor
spells.description: This spell completely destroys any leather armor or clothing worn by the target. The treated animal hide disintegrates instantly, leaving the wearer unprotected. Other materials are unaffected.

spells.name: Death of the Noble Beast
spells.description: This lethal spell outright kills a single animal by destroying its life force. Creatures with Might scores may resist with Magic Resistance, but mundane animals have no defense. The creature simply collapses and dies instantly with no visible wounds.
